summary: The marketing team reviewed the Q1 campaign progress, discussed budget allocation, and planned for the upcoming product launch. Key decisions included moving forward with a new landing page design, postponing the email marketing campaign, and scheduling a budget review meeting.
key_decisions: Move forward with the new landing page design.
Postpone the email marketing campaign until after the landing page deployment.
Schedule a budget review meeting for Thursday afternoon.

tasks.task: Coordinate with the development team to deploy the new landing page design.
Prepare a detailed breakdown of current Q1 marketing expenses.
Help Sarah with the technical metrics for the campaign performance report.

action_items: Lisa to coordinate with the development team for landing page deployment.
Sarah to prepare the campaign performance report and budget breakdown.
John to schedule a budget review meeting.
Postpone the email marketing campaign until after the landing page deployment.
